title: Studies in Performance Spring Production
description: A full spring production featuring the original choreographic work of undergraduate dance students, developed under the mentorship and direction of a faculty member. Admission by audition only. May be taken for credit up to six times for a maximum of twelve units. Prerequisites: audition, department approval, concurrent enrollment in TDMV 110 or TDMV 111 or TDMV 112 or TDMV 120 or TDMV 122 or TDMV 130 or TDMV 133.
